technical.title: Cyber Jobs Web Using CodeIgniter
technical.description: Final project for the Web Programming course. Developed a job portal website where users can register, post, and apply for jobs.
keyFeatures: User registration and authentication for job seekers and companies

technical.title: Wedding Organizer Java App using Swing Framework
technical.description: Final project for the OOP course. A desktop app with admin, organizer, and user roles to manage wedding packages, bookings, and finances.

technical.title: Heart Disease Prediction
technical.description: Final project for the Statistics course. Predicted heart disease using machine learning models based on several health indicators.
keyFeatures: Implemented multiple ML models (e.g., Logistic Regression, Decision Tree)

technical.title: Machine Learning Portfolio
technical.description: Final project from Dicoding's ML course. Built a model to classify hand gestures (rock, paper, scissors) using deep learning.
keyFeatures: Built a CNN model for image classification
Used TensorFlow and Keras for model training
Achieved high accuracy in gesture recognition

technical.title: Library Management System
technical.description: Final project for the Programming Algorithms course. Created a CLI-based library management app to manage books, members, and loans.

design.title: BEM Cyber University Social Media Design
design.description: Designed various social media content for BEM Cyber University to boost engagement and promote events.
keyFeatures: Communicated 50+ updates to stakeholders through online and offline channels
Published detailed reports and documentation using visual and written content
Managed social media to build and maintain external relations for BEM Cyber University
Designed cohesive and visually engaging Instagram feeds to boost online presence

design.title: Decompe 3.0 Social Media Design
design.description: Created digital assets and campaign visuals for Decompe 3.0, an event held to promote competitive programming.
keyFeatures: Developed and executed marketing strategies for brand growth
Created 30+ engaging Instagram graphics, increasing user engagement
Produced impactful content for Decompe 3.0's Instagram to drive interaction and traffic
Designed 10+ merchandise items, enhancing brand visibility and sales

design.title: Redesign PT Alpha Zamasto Landing Page
design.description: Final project for Human-Computer Interaction course. Designed a modern and user-friendly landing page for PT Alpha Zamasto.
keyFeatures: Modern UI layout with mobile-first approach

design.title: Children's Book Design
design.description: Designed and illustrated three books for children aged 4-7, integrating educational content with engaging visuals.
keyFeatures: Created 3 engaging children's books for ages 4-7 with 25+ structured pages each
Designed 3 custom book covers to match content and theme
Illustrated characters using vector graphics to enhance storytelling and visual appeal

design.title: Image Manipulation Using Photoshop
design.description: Created a portfolio of image manipulation works showcasing photo compositing, color correction, and visual storytelling.

design.title: Designing 'STEPS' User Interface Apps
design.description: Final project for Software Engineering course. Designed the user interface for a mobile app focusing on user journey and accessibility.

design.title: Making BEM Cyber University Video Profile
design.description: Produced a video profile that showcases the activities, vision, and mission of BEM Cyber University.
